title: Customer Loan Application Portal
description: Enable applicants to digitally apply for loans, track status, and receive notifications, streamlining the application experience and improving turnaround time.

userStories.title: Digital Loan Application Submission
userStories.description: Allow loan applicants to submit personal and loan information, upload documents, and review the application before submitting.

tasks.title: Loan Application Form Submission
tasks.description: As a loan applicant, I want to fill and submit my loan application online so that I can apply quickly without visiting the branch.
acceptance_criteria:
Given a logged-in user
When they complete all required fields and submit the application
Then a success message is displayed and the application is saved

[Edge] Given a user submits an application with missing required fields
When they attempt to submit
Then an error message is shown for each missing field

[Negative] Given a user is not authenticated
When they try to access the loan application form
Then they are redirected to the login page

tasks.title: Document Upload & Verification
tasks.description: As a loan applicant, I want to upload ID and income documents so that my application can be processed without manual paperwork.
acceptance_criteria:
Given a completed application
When documents are uploaded in supported formats (PDF, JPG, PNG)
Then the documents are accepted and verification begins

[Edge] Given a user uploads a corrupted or unsupported file
When the upload completes
Then an error message is displayed

[Negative] Given a user uploads a malicious or virus-infected document
When the document verification runs
Then the document is rejected and flagged for review

tasks.title: View Application Status
tasks.description: As a loan applicant, I want to track the status of my application so that I am informed of progress.
acceptance_criteria:
Given an applicant with an active application
When they visit the status page
Then their application status and last updated timestamp are displayed

[Edge] Given an applicant has no submitted applications
When they visit the status page
Then an empty-state message is displayed with a link to start an application

[Negative] Given I am not authenticated
When I request the application status
Then I receive a 401 Unauthorized response

userStories.title: Automated Notifications and Reminders
userStories.description: Automatically notify applicants of key milestones, missing documents, and decision outcomes via email and SMS.

tasks.title: Application Submission Confirmation
tasks.description: As a loan applicant, I want to receive an email/SMS confirmation after submitting my application so that I know it was received.
acceptance_criteria:
Given an application is submitted
When the submission is successful
Then a confirmation email and SMS are sent to the applicant

[Edge] Given applicant’s email or phone is missing
When submission is successful
Then only the available communication method is used

tasks.title: Reminder for Missing Documents
tasks.description: As a loan applicant, I want to be reminded if my application is incomplete so that I can provide missing documents promptly.
acceptance_criteria:
Given an application with missing required documents
When 24 hours pass after initial submission
Then a reminder email/SMS is sent to the applicant

[Negative] Given applicant communication preferences exclude email and SMS
When reminders are triggered
Then no notification is sent

tasks.title: Final Decision Notification
tasks.description: As a loan applicant, I want to be notified when a decision is made on my application so that I know the outcome instantly.
acceptance_criteria:
Given an application is approved or rejected
When the decision is made
Then a notification email/SMS with the decision is sent to the applicant

title: Loan Officer & Underwriter Dashboard
description: Empower loan officers and underwriters with tools to efficiently manage, verify, and approve applications, reducing manual work and errors.

userStories.title: Dashboard for Application Management
userStories.description: A unified dashboard for viewing, filtering, and prioritizing loan applications.

tasks.title: Filter and Search Applications
tasks.description: As a loan officer, I want to search and filter applications by status, applicant name, and submission date so that I can quickly find relevant cases.
acceptance_criteria:
Given multiple applications
When filtering or searching by status, name, or date
Then only matching results are displayed

[Edge] Given no results match the filter criteria
When search is executed
Then a 'No applications found' message appears

tasks.title: View Application Details
tasks.description: As a loan officer, I want to view all details of an application so that I can assess eligibility accurately.
acceptance_criteria:
Given an application exists
When it is selected on the dashboard
Then all details, uploaded documents, and status history are displayed

userStories.title: Automated Document & Identity Verification
userStories.description: Use OCR and third-party APIs to verify applicant identity and document authenticity, flagging risks and reducing manual entry.

tasks.title: Automatic OCR Processing
tasks.description: As a loan officer, I want the system to automatically extract data from uploaded ID/income documents so that I can avoid manual entry and errors.
acceptance_criteria:
Given a document is uploaded
When OCR processing runs
Then key information is extracted and saved in the application

[Edge] Given OCR cannot read data
When processing completes
Then application is flagged for manual review

tasks.title: Manual Verification Fallback
tasks.description: As a loan officer, I want to manually verify documents if automatic verification fails so that applications can still be processed.
acceptance_criteria:
Given automatic verification fails
When I review documents manually
Then I can override the verification status and add comments

[Negative] Given a document is clear and automatically verified
When manual verification is attempted
Then a warning prompts that override is not recommended

title: Integration & Automation Services
description: Automate credit checks, approval workflows, and ensure seamless data flow with external and core banking systems.

userStories.title: Credit Bureau Integration
userStories.description: Automate credit history retrieval and scoring using external APIs for faster and more accurate decisions.

tasks.title: Automated Credit Check
tasks.description: As a loan officer, I want the system to automatically request and display applicant credit scores so that approvals are evidence-based.
acceptance_criteria:
Given a new application is ready for review
When credit check is triggered
Then credit score and report are retrieved via API and displayed in the application

[Edge] Given the Credit Bureau API is unavailable
When credit check fails
Then a notification prompts manual credit review

[Negative] Given an unauthorized access attempt to the Credit Bureau API
When the request is made
Then a 403 Forbidden error is logged

userStories.title: Core Banking Approval Workflow Integration
userStories.description: Enable seamless submission of approved loan applications to the bank’s core system for disbursement.

tasks.title: Submit Approved Application to Core System
tasks.description: As a loan officer, I want to send approved applications directly to the Core Banking System so that funding happens swiftly and accurately.
acceptance_criteria:
Given an application is approved
When I select 'Submit to Core System'
Then the application details are sent via API with confirmation of receipt

[Edge] Given the Core Banking System API is down
When submission is attempted
Then an error message with retry options appears

[Negative] Given an application fails core system validation
When submission is attempted
Then a rejection message and reason are displayed

title: Reporting, Analytics & Compliance
description: Provide stakeholders with analytics dashboards and audit trails to ensure regulatory compliance and monitor KPIs.

userStories.title: Loan Processing Analytics
userStories.description: Generate reports on loan volume, approval rates, turnaround time, and manual intervention to measure business objectives.

tasks.title: Automated KPI Dashboard
tasks.description: As a compliance officer, I want to view real-time loan processing statistics so that I can monitor performance and business objectives.
acceptance_criteria:
Given sufficient transaction data
When I access the analytics dashboard
Then metrics for volume, turnaround, auto-processing rates, and CSAT are displayed

[Edge] Given there is no data yet
When dashboard is accessed
Then an empty state is shown with 'No data available' message

userStories.title: Audit & Activity Logs
userStories.description: Track and log all application-related actions for regulatory compliance and internal review.

tasks.title: View Application Audit Trail
tasks.description: As a compliance officer, I want to review all actions taken on an application so that regulatory audits are possible.
acceptance_criteria:
Given an application with activity history
When 'Audit Trail' is opened
Then action logs (who, when, what) are chronologically displayed

[Negative] Given insufficient permissions
When audit logs are requested
Then an 'Access Denied' message is shown
